text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Woohoo! It's finally, finally, finally,<n>finally here!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: It certainly is! The long-awaited<n>Winning Dream Stage is—

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
An endless wasteland, sprawling<n>ahead... Untouched gold
mines,<n>mysterious ancient ruins! Now, take<n>my hand,
McQueen! Let's go on an<n>adventure!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
What are you talking about?! We<n>have a performance
today! A concert!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Haha, does Golshi ever make sense?<n>It's so McQueen to
snatch the bait<n>too, but... What's this?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Earth to Spe?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yes! I'm here! Is it my time to sing?!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Not yet... but are you okay? You look<n>terribly nervous.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ah... Yeah... Just a little, but... I mean,<n>no. I'm sorry! I'm
super nervous!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Up until now, everyone's worked so<n>hard to prepare for
today's event, so...<n>I don't wanna ruin it!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Balderdash!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
What do you keep looking back at,<n>Spe? Are your toes
where your heels<n>should be?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wh-what?! My toes are in the front!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I know it can be aggravating trying to<n>understand what Gold
Ship means to<n>say, but she has a point, or... a<n>percentage
of one, rather.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
A commemoration is not only about<n>celebrating the past, but
also paving<n>the way for the future.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Right. So basically, don't worry so<n>much about the "up until
now," 'cause<n>we gotta do our best for the<n>"hereafter"! ♪

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: You'll be fine, Spe. Remember...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Every day, no matter what... we've<n>always run forward,
right?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Don't look back... just keep moving<n>forward. Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Our thoughts and feelings will be<n>conveyed through our
performance!
